Assessment.QuestionText: Which of the following statements regarding the common dialog boxes are true and which statements are false?

Options.Option: The <font face="courier new">ShowDialogBox()</font> method is used to display the dialog box to the user.
The <font face="courier new">CustomColors</font> property is used to set or get the custom colors of the <font face="courier new">ColorDialog</font> component.
The <font face="courier new">Fonts</font> property is used to set or get the selected font style of the <font face="courier new">FontDialog</font> component.
The <font face="courier new">OpenFiles()</font> method is used to open the specified file with the read-only permission.
The <font face="courier new">AllowOrientation</font> property is used to set or get a value whether the user can specify the orientation of a page.

Assessment.CorrectFeedback: Yes, that’s correct! You get one point for your response.
Assessment.incorrectFeedback: No, that’s incorrect. The correct selections are: (A)-(False), (B)-(True), (C)-(False), (D)-(False), and (E)-(True).
